top_stories.title: LangChain Launches Open SWE, an Open-Source Asynchronous Coding Agent
top_stories.description: LangChain has released Open SWE, a fully open-source, asynchronous coding agent designed to operate in the cloud and handle complex software development tasks. The company says Open SWE represents a shift away from real-time “copilot” assistants toward more autonomous, long-running agents that integrate directly with a developer’s existing workflows. By Robert Krzaczyński
top_stories.author: Robert Krzaczyński
top_stories.content: LangChain has released Open SWE, a fully open-source, asynchronous coding agent designed to operate in the cloud and handle complex software development tasks. The company says Open SWE represents a shift away from real-time “copilot” assistants toward more autonomous, long-running agents that integrate directly with a developer’s existing workflows. By Robert Krzaczyński

top_stories.title: TT-XAI: Trustworthy Clinical Text Explanations via Keyword Distillation and LLM Reasoning
top_stories.description: arXiv:2508.08273v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Clinical language models often struggle to provide trustworthy predictions and explanations when applied to lengthy, unstructured electronic health records (EHRs). This work introduces TT-XAI, a lightweight and effective framework that improves both classification performance and interpretability through domain-aware keyword distillation and reasoning with large language models (LLMs). First, we demonstrate that distilling raw discharge notes into...
top_stories.author: Kristian Miok, Blaz \v{S}krlj, Daniela Zaharie, Marko Robnik \v{S}ikonja

top_stories.title: Just Released: NVIDIA HPC SDK v25.7
top_stories.description: The HPC SDK v25.7 includes support for CUDA 12.9U1, updated library components, bugfixes, and performance improvements.
top_stories.author: Shara Tibken
top_stories.content: The HPC SDK v25.7 includes support for CUDA 12.9U1, updated library components, bugfixes, and performance improvements.

top_stories.title: Fine-tune OpenAI GPT-OSS models on Amazon SageMaker AI using Hugging Face libraries
top_stories.description: Released on August 5, 2025, OpenAI’s GPT-OSS models, gpt-oss-20b and gpt-oss-120b, are now available on AWS through Amazon SageMaker AI and Amazon Bedrock. In this post, we walk through the process of fine-tuning a GPT-OSS model in a fully managed training environment using SageMaker AI training jobs.
top_stories.author: Pranav Murthy
top_stories.content: Released on August 5, 2025, OpenAI’s GPT-OSS models, gpt-oss-20b and gpt-oss-120b, are now available on AWS through Amazon SageMaker AI and Amazon Bedrock. In this post, we walk through the process of fine-tuning a GPT-OSS model in a fully managed training environment using SageMaker AI training jobs.
